alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 10:17AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate snow amounts expected above 6000 feet, with lighter amounts down to 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, with the highest amounts above 6500 feet. Winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Prescott and Valle. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult this afternoon. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 5 AM Monday: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches North Rim 8 to 12 inches Prescott 1 to 3 inches Valle 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Yavapai County Mountains
